[ Live Price Lock Guarantee ]
We are now offering our new Price Lock Guarantee on all accounts. What does this mean to you? Well this means that for as long as you are a customer with us, any plan you purchase will stay at that same price for the length of your stay with us. We will never raise the price of your current plan, except if it was terminated, or you plan to upgrade/downgrade to another plan.

[ 99% Server Uptime Guarantee ]
We work hard to deal with unpredictable occurrences such as attacks, hardware issues, etc. Let's keep it real, there's really no such thing as 100% uptime guarantee, since there are many unpredictable threads such as DoS attacks, hardware issues, calamities that can strike our datacenter, and a lot more to mention. What we guarantee is our 99% Server Uptime.

[ 100% Satisfaction Guarantee ]
We are very confident that you will be satisfied, or better yet, be delighted with our services, its because we offer you with almost everything and anything you will need, from support assistance up until providing you with all the easy-to-use tools you will need to succeed.
